TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyPath extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现一个数据结构，用于将某个属性描述为另一个属性或所属类型下的路径。

span.span: Implements a data structure for describing a property as a path below another property, or below an owning type.

summary.span: 属性路径用于对象的数据绑定，并用于动画的情节提要和时间线。

span.span: Property paths are used in data binding to objects, and in storyboards and timelines for animations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含一个字符串，以及所依赖项属性的列表到字符串。This class contains a string , and list of dependency properties that are the into the string . 支持两种模式的行为： supports two modes of behavior: **源模式**描述用作源的某个其他操作的属性的路径。**Source mode** describes a path to a property that is used as a source for some other operation. 通过使用此模式类，以支持数据绑定。This mode is used by the class to support data binding. **目标模式**描述将设置为目标属性的属性的路径。**Target mode** describes a path to a property that will be set as a target property. 此模式可供支持情节提要和时间线 setter 的动画。This mode is used by animation in support of storyboard and timeline setters. 例如，`Background.Opacity`是双重路径。For instance, `Background.Opacity` is a two-step path. 此路径意味着： 首先，查找`Background`对象的属性获取的值对象`Background`属性设置为，，然后获取的值`Opacity`对该对象的属性。This path implies: first, find the `Background` property of an object, get the value object that the `Background` property is set to, and then get the value of the `Opacity` property on that object. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object parameter) cil managed

param.name: parameter
param.span: 一个属性路径，它描述[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 属性或单一依赖项属性的路径。

span.span: A property path that either describes a path to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property, or a single dependency property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数具有两个完全不同的用法，具体取决于是否正在使用的源模式属性路径的绑定或情节提要目标的目标模式单步执行属性路径。This constructor has two completely different usages depending on whether it is being used for a source-mode property path for a binding, or for a target-mode single-step property path for a storyboard target. 如果使用此在源模式中的绑定`parameter`是一个表示属性名称的字符串，也可以是一个字符串，描述中的属性的"单步执行"路径[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]用作源的对象的对象模型用于绑定。If using this in source mode for a binding, `parameter` is a string representing a property name, or can be a string that describes a "step-through" path to the property in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object model of the object that is being used as the source for a binding. 绑定属性路径，请标识"步骤"的字符是一个点 （.）。For a binding property path, the character that identifies a "step" is a dot (.). 此外支持索引器引用 （包括多个索引器和类型区分）。Indexer references (including multiple indexers, and type differentiation) are also supported. 有关详细信息的明确地使用的字符串的语法对象，请参阅。For more details on the syntax of the string as specifically used by the object, see . 用作绑定源的属性不需要依赖项属性。A property used as a binding source need not be a dependency property. 如果双向绑定，更新所引用的属性必须是读写。If the binding updates two-way, the property referenced must be read-write. 另请注意，绑定目标必须是依赖项属性。Also note that the binding target does have to be a dependency property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For details, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 如果使用此在目标情节提要目标的单步执行路径的模式下`parameter`通常情况下提供作为类型。If using this in target mode for a single-step path for a storyboard target, `parameter` is generally provided as type . 此外可以指定一个字符串，它。You can also specify a string that is the . 其中一种计算结果为相同的结果，因为它作为字符串在内部存储。Either of these evaluate to the same result, because it is stored internally as a string. 提供转换为一个字符串，通过。A provided is converted to a string through . 依赖属性支持使用限定的命名格式，因此可以指定*typeName*。*propertyName*限定到的依赖项属性名称字符串在代码中的构造函数。The supports a qualified naming format for dependency properties, so you can specify a *typeName*.*propertyName* qualified dependency property name string to the constructor in code. 依赖项属性标识符的限定的路径是不同的概念，而复杂的路径。The qualified path to the dependency property identifier is a different concept than a complex path. 复杂路径应改为创建使用构造函数。A complex-path should instead be created with the constructor.

summary.span: 使用提供的路径标记字符串和参数初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the provided pathing token string and parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此签名通常仅用于目标模式复杂路径的用法。This signature is generally only used for target-mode usages with complex paths. 此构造函数支持`params`为`pathParameters`构造函数参数。This constructor supports `params` for the `pathParameters` constructor argument. 因此，您可以指定的内容`pathParameters`作为一系列以逗号分隔的构造函数自变量填充数组，而不是无需划分数组维度，然后填充其与`pathParameters`项。Therefore you can specify the contents of `pathParameters` as a series of comma-separated constructor arguments that populate the array, rather than needing to dimension an array and then populate it with the `pathParameters` items. 指定每个项必须是以下类型之一： ， ， 。Each item you specify must be one of the following types: , , . 有关参数的要求的详细信息，请参阅和。For more information on the requirements of the parameters, see and .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Path : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置描述路径的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that describes the path.
The string that describes the path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性中包含的字符串具有三个完全不同的含义，具体取决于是否用于一个情节提要目标、 目标模式单步执行属性路径的绑定，或一个复杂的源模式属性路径情节提要目标路径。The string contained in this property has three completely different meanings depending on whether a is being used for a source-mode property path for a binding, for a target-mode single-step property path for a storyboard target, or for a complex path for a storyboard target. 如果使用此在源模式中的绑定是一个表示属性名称的字符串，也可以是一个字符串，描述中的属性的"单步执行"路径[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]用作源的对象的对象模型用于绑定。If using this in source mode for a binding, is a string representing a property name, or can be a string that describes a "step-through" path to the property in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object model of the object that is being used as the source for a binding. 绑定属性路径，请标识"步骤"的字符是一个点 （.）。For a binding property path, the character that identifies a "step" is a dot (.). 此外支持索引器引用 （包括多个索引器和类型区分）。Indexer references (including multiple indexers, and type differentiation) are also supported. 有关详细信息的明确地使用的字符串的语法对象，请参阅。For more details on the syntax of the string as specifically used by the object, see . 用作绑定源的属性不需要依赖项属性。A property used as a binding source need not be a dependency property. 如果双向绑定，更新的属性源必须是读写。If the binding updates two-way, the property source must be read-write. 另请注意，绑定目标必须是依赖项属性。Also note that the binding target does have to be a dependency property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For details, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 如果使用此在目标情节提要目标的单步执行路径的模式下是一个字符串，它*typeName*。*propertyName*限定依赖项属性名称字符串。If using this in target mode for a single-step path for a storyboard target, is a string that is a *typeName*.*propertyName* qualified dependency property name string. 如果使用此情节提要目标的复杂路径是一种已标记化的字符串格式，描述中提供的各种对象的关系。If using this for a complex path for a storyboard target, is a tokenized string format that describes the relationships of the various objects given in the . - 括在括号中的项的数组索引的情况下，按以下格式指定数组中的每个项。Each item in the array is specified in this format by the array index for the item enclosed in parentheses. 例如，若要指定数组中的第一项，字符串标记是`(0)`。For example, to specify the first item in the array, the string token is `(0)`. - 由点 （.） 指定项 （如在路径中的"步骤"） 之间的关系。Relationships between items ("steps" in the path) are specified by a dot (.). 前面的点属性是第一步在路径中之后, 的属性是第二个步骤中，依此类推 （您可以指定超过两个步骤）。The property forward of the dot is the first step in the path, the property after is the second step, and so on (you can specify steps beyond two). 链中的最后一步始终表示正在进行动画处理的属性。The last step in the chain always represents the property being animated. - 通过索引器语法，在方括号内的索引访问集合属性中的项 （[和]）。Items within collection properties are accessed with an indexer syntax, with the index within square brackets ([ and ]). 索引器是累加到标记表示的属性。The indexer is additive to the token representing the property. 例如，下面是需要两个路径，指定从该属性的集合中的第二个项的第一步中标记的组合： `(0)[1].(1)` 。For example, the following is a two-step path, with the token combination in the first step specifying the second item from within the collection of that property: `(0)[1].(1)` . 链; 中的最后一个属性不能使用索引器不能实际集合位置进行动画处理，必须对该对象的属性进行动画处理。You cannot use an indexer on the last property in the chain; you cannot animate the actual collection position, you must animate a property on that object. 路径字符串通常通过构造函数建立：绑定或单步情节提要目标签名多步骤情节提要目标的签名。The path string for a is typically established through the constructors: the signature for bindings or single-step storyboard targets, the signature for multi-step storyboard targets. **XAML:** 使用时描述中的属性引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，如由类型转换器首先处理的属性值，指定的字符串 ()。**XAML:** When you use a to describe a property reference in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], as an attribute value, the string that you specify is first handled by a type converter (). 然后，此类型转换器处理字符串并基于其语法调用的其中一个构造函数签名。This type converter then processes the string and based on its syntax will call one of the constructor signatures. 处理特性值的类型转换器通过这种间接方式通常是如何使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，而不是声明对象元素，然后应用到属性的特定值，如和.This indirection through the type converter handling an attribute value is generally how you use in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], rather than declaring a object element and then applying specific values to attributes such as and . 有关详细信息，请参阅[PropertyPath XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md)。For more information, see [PropertyPath XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md). ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 成员类型通常未设置以直接[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法。Members of the type are not typically set in a direct [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PathParameters As Collection(Of Object)

summary.span: 获取要在路径引用索引参数时使用的参数列表。

span.span: Gets the list of parameters to use when the path refers to indexed parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关属性通常是通过构造函数。The properties for a are typically established through the constructors. 为设置，则构造函数功能特别便利因为`pathParameters`构造函数参数指定为`params`，这意味着，您不需要创建或维度构造一个数组。For setting , the constructor is particularly convenient because the `pathParameters` constructor argument is designated as `params`, meaning that you do not need to create or dimension an array for construction. 您只需指定为一个附加参数的数组的每个成员。You simply specify each member of the array as an additional parameter. 如果最后一个属性的目标是键入时，将克隆值。If the final property that is the target is a type, that value will be cloned. 有关详细信息，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For details, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 情节提要动画机制执行属性链的实际计算。The actual evaluation of the property chain is performed by the storyboard animation mechanisms. 在级别，不执行任何验证，确保路径的步骤在所有连接。At the level, no validation is performed to make sure that the steps of the path connect at all. 例如，可以构造具有的属性路径第一步，和作为第二个步骤。For instance, you can construct a property path that has as the first step, and as the second step. 此类的属性路径将失败; 如果这实际应用为目标，因为画笔类型来填满不具有属性。But such a property path would fail if actually applied as a target, because the Brush type that fills does not have a property. 无效的属性路径以静默方式失败。Invalid property paths fail silently. 有关详细信息，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For more information, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). **XAML:** 使用时描述中的属性引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，如由类型转换器首先处理的属性值，指定的字符串 ()。**XAML:** When you use a to describe a property reference in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], as an attribute value, the string that you specify is first handled by a type converter (). 然后，此类型转换器处理字符串并基于其语法调用的其中一个构造函数签名。This type converter then processes the string and based on its syntax will call one of the constructor signatures. 处理特性值的类型转换器通过这种间接方式通常是如何使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，而不是声明对象元素，然后应用到属性的特定值，如和.This indirection through the type converter handling an attribute value is generally how you use in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], rather than declaring a object element and then applying specific values to attributes such as and . 有关详细信息，请参阅[PropertyPath XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md)。For more information, see [PropertyPath XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md). ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 成员类型通常未设置以直接[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法。Members of the type are not typically set in a direct [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks.
